column4: I have compiz running and it's fine but there seems to be more theming for beryl...is there a speed difference that you are aware of? as in cpu sucking etc...
beryl has more features, and compiz is more bugfree according to some people.
no not really. I tried both but sort of preffered compiz.
both have clitshes, and I preffered those in compiz...
what window decorator are you using
if you use gwd any metacity theme should work
hm, I guess that is where I'm going wrong, not sure how to install a "window decorator", I'm just going to my system/themes
which compiz package are you using?
what does apt-cache show compiz say? should tell you which version you have installed
ahh. That's a pretty old package. You said you're on edgy right?
if you wan't to investigate you can go to www.go-compiz.org or www.beryl-project.org for further info
should give you details of both compiz and beryl
ok, I will, don't need any hand holding, I thought there might be a newer repo or something, thanks for the suggestions!
and how to get the latest packages for edgy. But be prepared for some tinkering...
didn't mean to "lecture". It's just that the newer versions are much better.
